text: Ernst Fuchs (February 13, 1930 - November 9, 2015) was an Austrian painter, draftsman, printmaker, sculptor, architect, stage designer, composer, poet, and singer. He was born in Vienna. He was one of the founders of the Vienna School of Fantastic Realism. In 1972, he bought the Otto Wagner Villa in HÃ¼tteldorf, which he restored and transformed. The villa was inaugurated as the Ernst Fuchs Museum in 1988. Fuchs died at the age of 85 on November 9, 2015"Austrian painter Ernst Fuchs dies aged 85." Belfast Telegraph.
